translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ある日豹変する、そうに決まってる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: One day she will suddenly change, that's for sure.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そんなことはありません。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That's not true.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: どうぞ、この曇りなきまなこをよく――
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Please, look closely into these clear, unwavering eyes—

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その顔やめろ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Stop making that face.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ひどいですぞ……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That's terrible...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: とにかく、お前はオノハに近づくの禁止。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: In any case, you are forbidden to approach Onoha.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 勧誘などもってのほかだ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Soliciting her is absolutely out of the question.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: うう……びくびく……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ugh... trembling...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: はあ、仕方ありませんな……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Sigh, it can't be helped...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 後ろ髪引かれる思いですが、諦めましょう
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I feel torn, but let's give up.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: こうして、オノハの更生への道は断たれた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: And so, Onoha's path to rehabilitation was cut off.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 我が武！　どうか世界平和へお役立て下さい！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: My martial arts! Please put them to use for world peace!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 失礼致します！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Excuse me!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 我が名はサムソン・マキシモフ！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: My name is Samson Maksimov!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ヘルマンはヒアルロン山におわす、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I am from Heilman, the Hyaluron Mountain,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 武術仙人の弟子でございます！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and a disciple of a martial arts hermit!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 此度は総統閣下に謁見の機会を頂けたこと、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I deeply appreciate having this opportunity to meet with the Supreme Commander!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 深く感謝を申し上げます！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I offer my sincerest thanks!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: よし、お前クビ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Alright, you're fired.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ええええええ！？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Whaaaaat!?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: サムソンはクビになった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Samson was fired.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: お、お待ち下さい！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: P-Please wait!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: わ、私の何が不満で……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: W-What about me are you dissatisfied with...?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 声でかい、うっとうしい、暑苦しい。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Your voice is loud, annoying, and suffocating.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いらない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You're not needed.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そ、そんな……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: N-No way...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 大体、お前どっから来たって？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: By the way, where exactly did you come from?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なんちゃら山とか……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Some mountain or other...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ヒアルロン山、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hyaluron Mountain,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ヘルマンの片田舎にある山です
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: a mountain in the countryside of Heilman.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 私はそこでずっと、師匠のもとで、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I have been there all along, training under my master,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 武術の修行をしておりました
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: practicing martial arts.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 恥ずかしながら……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Though I am ashamed to admit it...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 私は世界のありようを何も知らぬまま、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I was ignorant of the world's situation,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 呑気に修行の日々を送っておりました
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and spent my days training carefree.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ある日のことです
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Then one day,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 買い物をする為に下山したところ、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I went down the mountain to buy supplies,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 十数の魔物兵に襲われる村の方々が……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and saw villagers being attacked by more than a dozen monster soldiers...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 私は必死に戦いました……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I desperately fought...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦いましたが、あまりの数の多さに、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I fought, but their overwhelming numbers,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: とても全員を救うことは……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: made it impossible to save them all...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 腕の中で冷たくなっていく人……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: People growing cold in my arms...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 子を守る為に身を挺して死んでいく親……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Parents sacrificing themselves to protect their children...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そこにはこの世の地獄がありました……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: There was the very Hell on earth...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 私は……
何も知らなかった己を恥じました……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: was ashamed of how little I knew...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 己の武だけを鍛え上げることに心血を注いでいた、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I had been devoting myself solely to strengthening my own martial arts,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 手前勝手さに背筋が寒くなりました……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That selfishness sent chills down my spine...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 私は決心したのです。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I made a decision.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: この力は己の為ではなく、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This power is not for myself,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 世界の為に、弱き方々の為に使わねば、と
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but must be used for the world, for the weak.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 私は師匠の反対を押し切り、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I defied my master's opposition,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: こうして下山し、ヘルマン軍に入りました
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: came down the mountain, and joined the Heilman army.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: どうかお願い致します！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Please, I implore you!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 私を魔人討伐隊の末席にお加え下さい！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Allow me to join the demon extermination squad, even at the bottom rank!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ほんの少しでも、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Even just a little,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 世界平和の為の一助となりたいのです！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I want to contribute to world peace!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: やだ、帰れ、クビ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: No, go away, you're fired.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ガーーーン！！！！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: GAAAAAAH!!!!

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ある日豹変する、そうに決まってる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: One day she will suddenly change, that's for sure.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そんなことはありません。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That's not true.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: どうぞ、この曇りなきまなこをよく――
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Please, look closely into these clear, unwavering eyes—

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その顔やめろ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Stop making that face.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ひどいですぞ……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That's terrible...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: とにかく、お前はオノハに近づくの禁止。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: In any case, you are forbidden to approach Onoha.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 勧誘などもってのほかだ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Soliciting her is absolutely out of the question.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: うう……びくびく……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ugh... trembling...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: はあ、仕方ありませんな……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Sigh, it can't be helped...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 後ろ髪引かれる思いですが、諦めましょう
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I feel torn, but let's give up.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: こうして、オノハの更生への道は断たれた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: And so, Onoha's path to rehabilitation was cut off.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 我が武！　どうか世界平和へお役立て下さい！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: My martial arts! Please put them to use for world peace!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 失礼致します！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Excuse me!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 我が名はサムソン・マキシモフ！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: My name is Samson Maksimov!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ヘルマンはヒアルロン山におわす、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I am from Heilman, the Hyaluron Mountain,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 武術仙人の弟子でございます！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and a disciple of a martial arts hermit!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 此度は総統閣下に謁見の機会を頂けたこと、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I deeply appreciate having this opportunity to meet with the Supreme Commander!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 深く感謝を申し上げます！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I offer my sincerest thanks!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: よし、お前クビ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Alright, you're fired.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ええええええ！？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Whaaaaat!?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: サムソンはクビになった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Samson was fired.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: お、お待ち下さい！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: P-Please wait!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: わ、私の何が不満で……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: W-What about me are you dissatisfied with...?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 声でかい、うっとうしい、暑苦しい。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Your voice is loud, annoying, and suffocating.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いらない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You're not needed.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そ、そんな……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: N-No way...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 大体、お前どっから来たって？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: By the way, where exactly did you come from?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なんちゃら山とか……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Some mountain or other...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ヒアルロン山、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hyaluron Mountain,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ヘルマンの片田舎にある山です
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: a mountain in the countryside of Heilman.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 私はそこでずっと、師匠のもとで、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I have been there all along, training under my master,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 武術の修行をしておりました
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: practicing martial arts.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 恥ずかしながら……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Though I am ashamed to admit it...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 私は世界のありようを何も知らぬまま、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I was ignorant of the world's situation,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 呑気に修行の日々を送っておりました
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and spent my days training carefree.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ある日のことです
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Then one day,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 買い物をする為に下山したところ、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I went down the mountain to buy supplies,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 十数の魔物兵に襲われる村の方々が……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and saw villagers being attacked by more than a dozen monster soldiers...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 私は必死に戦いました……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I desperately fought...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦いましたが、あまりの数の多さに、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I fought, but their overwhelming numbers,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: とても全員を救うことは……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: made it impossible to save them all...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 腕の中で冷たくなっていく人……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: People growing cold in my arms...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 子を守る為に身を挺して死んでいく親……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Parents sacrificing themselves to protect their children...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そこにはこの世の地獄がありました……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: There was the very Hell on earth...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 私は……
何も知らなかった己を恥じました……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: was ashamed of how little I knew...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 己の武だけを鍛え上げることに心血を注いでいた、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I had been devoting myself solely to strengthening my own martial arts,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 手前勝手さに背筋が寒くなりました……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That selfishness sent chills down my spine...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 私は決心したのです。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I made a decision.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: この力は己の為ではなく、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This power is not for myself,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 世界の為に、弱き方々の為に使わねば、と
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but must be used for the world, for the weak.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 私は師匠の反対を押し切り、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I defied my master's opposition,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: こうして下山し、ヘルマン軍に入りました
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: came down the mountain, and joined the Heilman army.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: どうかお願い致します！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Please, I implore you!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 私を魔人討伐隊の末席にお加え下さい！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Allow me to join the demon extermination squad, even at the bottom rank!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ほんの少しでも、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Even just a little,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 世界平和の為の一助となりたいのです！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I want to contribute to world peace!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: やだ、帰れ、クビ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: No, go away, you're fired.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ガーーーン！！！！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: GAAAAAAH!!!!
